sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The wvstreams package contains the libwvcrypto, libwvstreams and libwvutils libraries.

sect3.title: libwvcrypto
sect3.para: libwvcrypto defines streams with built-in cryptography.

sect3.title: libwvstreams
sect3.para: libwvstreams defines the basic properties of a stream.
